title: A Higher Quality of Living!
posting_body: We now book our tour appointments online!
Please call or text us at
Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!
Enjoy your new life at Brookside Apartment Homes!
Stylish living with the convenience of easy access to the I-30 and Highway 360.
You are only moments from AT&T Stadium, Six Flags Over Texas, the Texas Rangers Ballpark, and the DFW Airport.

As a Brookside resident, you can enjoy an abundance of free amenities, some of which include cable-readiness, central heat and air, extra storage, vinyl hardwood flooring, oversized closets, kitchen appliances, washer/dryer connections, and beautifully tiled back-splashes in your kitchen.
Brookside is also close to public transportation and provides covered parking*, laundry facilities, a refreshing swimming pool, a dog park, and more!
If you like to work out, make sure to check out our on-site fitness center.
When you choose Brookside, you are selecting a fantastic neighborhood surrounded by shops, restaurants, entertainment, and parks.
We look forward to having you join our friendly community!
3 months,6 months,9 months,9+ months,12 months,12+ months
